description.en: This mystical orb will change the color of your upgraded armor's aura to White. Lasts 15 days.
description.ar: This mystical orb will change the color of your upgraded armor's aura to White. Lasts 15 days.
description.br: Esta mística orbe irá mudar a cor da aura da sua armadura fortalecida para a cor Branca. Dura 15 dias.
description.cns: 这个神秘的球体会将你升级后的盔甲光效的颜色更改为白色。持续15天。
description.de: Ändert die existierende Aura aufgewerteter Rüstungssets in die Farbe Weiß.
description.fi: This mystical orb will change the color of your upgraded armor's aura to White. Lasts 15 days.
description.fil: This mystical orb will change the color of your upgraded armor's aura to White. Lasts 15 days.
description.fr: Votre armure enchantée émet une aura blanche pendant 15 jours.
description.id: Bola mistis ini akan mengubah warna aura armor yang kamu upgrade menjadi White. Berlangsung selama 15 hari.
description.it: This mystical orb will change the color of your upgraded armor's aura to White. Lasts 15 days.
description.jp: 防具の精錬エフェクトを白色に変化させることのできる期間制アイテム
description.kr: 이 신비로운 아이템은 업그레이드된 갑옷의 아우라 색상을 흰색으로 바꿉니다. 15일간 지속됩니다.
description.nl: This mystical orb will change the color of your upgraded armor's aura to White. Lasts 15 days.
description.pl: This mystical orb will change the color of your upgraded armor's aura to White. Lasts 15 days.
description.ru: This mystical orb will change the color of your upgraded armor's aura to White. Lasts 15 days.
description.sp: Este orbe místico cambiará el color del aura de tu armadura mejorada a Blanco. Dura 15 días.
description.sw: This mystical orb will change the color of your upgraded armor's aura to White. Lasts 15 days.
description.th: ลูกแก้วลึกลับนี้จะเปลี่ยนสีออร่าของชุดเกราะที่คุณอัพเกรดเป็นสีขาว ใช้เวลา 15 วัน
description.tw: 將防具精鍊效果變成白色，持續15天。
description.vi: Quả cầu thần bí này sẽ thay đổi màu hào quang của áo giáp nâng cấp của bạn thành Màu trắng. Kéo dài 15 ngày.
